definitions.definition: A valued possession that has been passed down through the generations .
An old crop variety that has been passed down through generations of farmers by seed saving and cultivation , in contrast to modern cultivars used in large-scale agriculture .

main_definition: A valued possession that has been passed down through the generations .
secondary_definitions: ( horticulture ) An old crop variety that has been passed down through generations of farmers by seed saving and cultivation , in contrast to modern cultivars used in large-scale agriculture .
